summary.para: The SemWeb namespace contains types related to using information in Resource Description Format (RDF).

remarks.para: Classes that inherit from are repositories of RDF s about s (s and s).
The and , as well as the Drive-based , are the primary means of loading RDF data into stores and writing out RDF data into files.
The is a specialized RDF store used to combine the knowledge in multiple stores with inference engines.
The homepage of this library is at http://taubz.for.net/code/semweb.
